name: iineq2dv
params: setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0
body: |- wi(w0, wceq(ciin(s0, c0, c1), ciin(s0, c0, c2)))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(ciin(s0, c0, c1), ciin(s0, c0, c2)))
-| wnf(s0, w0)
-| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wceq(c1, c2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(ciin(s0, c0, c1), ciin(s0, c0, c2)))
-| wnf(s0, w0)
-| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wceq(c1, c2))

|- wi(w0, wceq(ciin(s0, c0, c1), ciin(s0, c0, c2)))
-| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wceq(c1, c2))
-| diffsw(s0, w0)

comment: Equality deduction for indexed intersection. (Contributed by NM, 3-Aug-2004.)
